translation:
Recognizing the government that for the prompt consolidation of the republican system, which the vast majority of the inhabitants of this State have solemnly proclaimed and which he swore to defend, it is of absolute necessity to take a loan, which ensuring advantageous profit to the competitors will meet the needs of war without burdening the peoples, already overwhelmed, and even to disregard violent measures, although applicable in the current state of affairs, I have been entrusted to promote the aforementioned loan, as seen in the attached decree of May 29 of the past year.

For this reason, I address Your Excellency for 1,000,000 reis in silver or gold, which will be paid to you within the deadline set by the aforementioned decree with the interest of one and a half percent per month, which will begin to run from the day that the document is delivered to you in this Secretariat.

To the Treasury on this date, that is, in this city, Your Excellency Piratini, June 9, 1837.
